message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $16000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value and my budget.

I understand that $14000 is still a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer it to you for $15500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and my costs.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $15500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $14500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value and my budget.

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $16000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and my costs. I think it's a fair price, considering the value you'll get from owning this product.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $16000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value and my budget. I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement at this price.

I understand that $14000 is a low price for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll offer it to you for $15000. This is my final concession, Bob. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and my costs. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to make the deal.
